ingredients.item: 100g frozen essential Waitrose Extra Fine Whole Green Beans
250g pack Waitrose LOVE Life Barley, Wheatberries, Spelt & Rice or 250g pack Waitrose LOVE Life Quinoa, Chickpeas, Bulgar Wheat & Rice

instructions.step: Preheat the oven to 200°C, gas mark 6. Place the salmon fillets in a small roasting tin and sprinkle with the Cajun seasoning. Drizzle over the honey along with 2 tbsp water and bake for 14 minutes.
Meanwhile, cook the beans in boiling water for 3-4 minutes, then drain.
Cook the spelt and rice pouch according to pack instructions, then stir in the beans. Top with the salmon and drizzle over any juices.
